nodes.text: Yurrita was a female Human who served in the Republic Army during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. She was stationed aboard Carrick Station.

Yurrita appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Hoth Modification Commendations Vendor on Carrick Station, though she was later relabeled as a Level 38 Modification Commendations Vendor. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Yurrita now also appears on a number of worlds in the place of the original armor, weapon, and mods vendors.
